channel.title: A door facing North east?
channel.description: Okay so i can make doors open and close when they are facing north, east, south, or west. But i can't find anywhere how you make a door open and close when its facing, for example North east. Any help would be much appreciated.

item.title: A door facing North east?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Leggyownz:

Okay so i can make doors open and close when they are facing north, east, south, or west. But i can’t find anywhere how you make a door open and close when its facing, for example North east. Any help would be much appreciated.

I would post answer but I am on my phone so I can’t look at my code. Best bet is to look at how killamess handled doors that are facing diagonnaly (has a tutorial). I have a feeling it was something to do with the number 9… like type 9 or something.

Read full topic
